Comments_List: A course that will likely expand your understanding of anthropology unless you are a devoted archaeologists. Developed a keen insight into the physical properties that govern much of archaeological research.

Conversation-based courses are sometimes hard to focus. It is difficult to know if you are mastering the material, but getting to communicate with a very knowledgeable professor and fellow students makes for a great experience.
A good way to expand your knowledge of anthropology if that interests you. If not, the material about fracture mechanics of flintknapping might be difficult to engage.
